package.name: industrial_ci
package.description:
This repository contains CI (Continuous Integration) configuration that can be commonly used by the repositories in ros-industrial organization. Non ros-industrial repositories in other organizations can utilize the CI config here too, as long as they are ROS-powered.
As of August 2016, this repo provides configuration for Travis CI. You can use from private CI server (e.g. in your corporate environment). The CI config in this repository is intended to be obtained by `git clone` feature. In client repos you can define custom, repository-specific checks, in addition to the generic configs stored in this repo.
Capabilities
Supported `ROS Indigo` onward. Older distro are experimentally supported.
Can be deployed on any CI server that can access the Internet.
Customize the pre/post process.
Build certain packages from source, not using their pre-built binary.
Downstream (i.e. packages that depends on the package you're testing) test.
ROS Prerelease Test on docker container.
Much more configuration via variables
package.author: Isaac I. Y. Saito
